BasicInfo.short: Jobnob is an online job platform offering alternative compensation work for job seekers.

Products.description: Jobnob Happy Hour was added to CrunchBase in 2009

Products.name: Jobnob Salary Finder
Products.description: Ever wonder what the person sitting next to you is earning? Or what someone doing the same job at a competitor is earning? Now you can find
